statements: SELECT player_id, achievement_name, achievement_date, score FROM player_achievements;
SELECT player_id, achievement_name, score, achievement_date FROM player_achievements;
SELECT achievement_name, player_id, score, achievement_date FROM player_achievements;
SELECT achievement_date, player_id, score, achievement_name FROM player_achievements;
SELECT player_id, score, achievement_name, achievement_date FROM player_achievements;
SELECT player_id, achievement_name, achievement_date, score FROM player_achievements WHERE player_id = '123456' ORDER BY achievement_date DESC;
SELECT player_id, achievement_name, score FROM player_achievements WHERE achievement_name LIKE '%tutorial%' ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT achievement_name, COUNT(*) AS total_achievements FROM player_achievements GROUP BY achievement_name;
SELECT player_id, AVG(score) AS avg_score FROM player_achievements WHERE achievement_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' GROUP BY player_id HAVING avg_score > 50;
SELECT player_id, MAX(score) AS top_score FROM player_achievements WHERE achievement_date = '2022-06-15';
SELECT * FROM achievements WHERE player_id = 100;
SELECT achievement_name, achieved_date FROM achievements WHERE player_id = 200 ORDER BY achieved_date DESC;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(achievement_id) as total_achievements FROM achievements GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT * FROM high_scores WHERE game_mode = 'Sprint' AND score > 10000 ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT player_id, MAX(score) as max_score FROM high_scores GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT * FROM achievements WHERE player_id = 123 ORDER BY achieved_date DESC;
SELECT achievement_name, achieved_date FROM achievements WHERE achievement_id > 10 AND player_id = 456;
SELECT achievement_name, achieved_date FROM achievements WHERE achievement_id < 5 AND player_id = 789 ORDER BY achieved_date ASC;
SELECT player_id, MAX(score) AS highest_score FROM high_scores GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT player_id, game_mode, MAX(score) AS highest_score FROM high_scores GROUP BY player_id, game_mode ORDER BY highest_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM PlayerAchievements WHERE player_id = 123;
SELECT player_id, achievement_id, timestamp FROM PlayerAchievements WHERE achievement_id = 456 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT player_id, score FROM PlayerScores WHERE game_id = 789 AND score > 100 ORDER BY score ASC;
SELECT game_id, player_id, score FROM Leaderboard WHERE game_id = 987 ORDER BY rank ASC, score DESC;
SELECT player_id, achievement_id, timestamp FROM PlayerAchievements WHERE player_id = 321 AND achievement_id = 654;
SELECT player_id, achievement_id, timestamp FROM PlayerAchievements WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, game_id, score, timestamp FROM PlayerScores WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT game_id, player_id, score, rank FROM Leaderboard WHERE game_id = 1 AND score >= 500 ORDER BY rank ASC;
SELECT player_id, MAX(achievement_id) AS max_achievement_id FROM PlayerAchievements GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT player_id, SUM(score) AS total_score FROM PlayerScores GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_score > 1000 ORDER BY total_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, email FROM players WHERE player_id = 'f7d0e8d4-5ce3-4f65-8c47-56bff7a6f027';
SELECT player_name, registration_date FROM players ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT player_name, achievement_name, achievement_date FROM players JOIN achievements ON players.player_id = achievements.player_id;
SELECT player_name, score, game_id FROM players JOIN high_scores ON players.player_id = high_scores.player_id WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT player_name, email FROM players WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM achievements WHERE achievement_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY achievement_date ASC;
SELECT player_name, score, game_id FROM players JOIN high_scores ON players.player_id = high_scores.player_id WHERE score > 1000 ORDER BY score DESC;

SELECT player_name, leaderboard_name, leaderboard_date FROM players JOIN high_scores ON players.player_id = high_scores.player_id JOIN leaderboards ON high_scores.game_id = leaderboards.game_id WHERE leaderboard_date > '2021-12-01' ORDER BY leaderboard_date ASC;
SELECT player_name, achievement_name, achievement_date FROM players JOIN achievements ON players.player_id = achievements.player_id WHERE player_name LIKE 'J%' OR player_name LIKE 'M%';
SELECT * FROM player;
SELECT player_name, join_date FROM player;
SELECT player_id, player_name, join_date FROM player ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM player WHERE player_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT achievement_id, player_id, achievement_name, achieved_date FROM achievement ORDER BY achieved_date;
SELECT * FROM player;
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM player ORDER BY join_date DESC;

SELECT player.player_name, leaderboard.leaderboard_name, high_score.score FROM player JOIN high_score ON player.player_id = high_score.player_id JOIN leaderboard_entry ON player.player_id = leaderboard_entry.player_id JOIN leaderboard ON leaderboard_entry.leaderboard_id = leaderboard.leaderboard_id WHERE high_score.score > 100 ORDER BY high_score.score DESC;

SELECT player.player_name, achievement.achievement_name, achievement.achieved_date FROM player LEFT JOIN achievement ON player.player_id = achievement.player_id WHERE achievement.achieved_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY achievement.achieved_date DESC;

SELECT player.player_name, COUNT(leaderboard_entry.entry_id) AS total_entries FROM player LEFT JOIN leaderboard_entry ON player.player_id = leaderboard_entry.player_id GROUP BY player.player_name HAVING total_entries > 5 ORDER BY total_entries DESC;
